
```{r}
trails <- macleish_layers[["trails"]] %>% 
  mutate(length = st_length(geometry)) %>% 
  group_by(name) %>% 
  mutate(total_length = sum(length))

leaflet() %>% 
  addTiles() %>% 
  addPolylines(data = trails, popup = ~name , color = ~pal())
```
